nz.ac.auckland.morc.utility

Class XmlUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.auckland.morc.utility.XmlUtilities

  • public class XmlUtilities
extends Object
    A class for handling XML documents. It is a bit heavy having to re-initialize everything each time, but the lack of thread safe in Java and the fact that performance isn't too much of a concern right now means I'm leaving it as is.
    Author:
    David MacDonald - d.macdonald@auckland.ac.nz
